question: What are the names of projects that were completed before 2022?
raw_answer: Bluffs Park Shade Structure, Guardrail Replacement Citywide.

(cid:190) Updates:

(cid:131) 65% design package was submitted to Caltrans in November 2020 and

we are still awaiting comments to those plans.
(cid:131) Civic Center Way was reopened to the public on April 8th.

Phase One of the project included a sound study to
determine the optimal number and locations of individual sirens, power and
infrastructure requirements, and siren sound range.

In March, the City be seeking
proposals from consultants to perform construction management.

Staff is
working on an RFQ to hire a consultant for the design.

The project consists of hiring a consultant to develop a plan that
includes the evaluation of a siren system and possible locations.

the Emergency Warning Sirens project will be implementation of the design
plan, including purchasing, installing, and testing the sirens.

While being
open, many project related items will continue. This will include
intermittent traffic control (lane closures).
